thread.title: Bay Bridge in San Francisco on fire: ...was built by Chinese contractors
thread.title_full: Bay Bridge in San Francisco on fire: ...was built by Chinese contractors

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Bay Bridge in San Francisco on fire: ...was built by Chinese contractors
text:
Bay Bridge in San Francisco on fire: ...was built by Chinese contractors Adv: 
Jul 14, 2015 Adv: 
Tourists love to cross this San Francisco bridge . On Monday night motorists reported flames coming from under the Bay Bridge in San Francisco on Monday night. 
Tweeting motorists had this to day: Are you suggesting a burning bridge is dangerous? The fire will go out when it falls in the bay. No worries. 
Well, it is California, and the bridge was built by Chinese contractors, so... :) 
The fire was reported at 10:09 p.m. near the East Treasure Island offramp. Accumulated debris in a 2-foot grated area caught fire under the bridge. The fire was extinguished quickly and no one was injured. 
The left two lanes were closed while Caltrans engineers were on scene Monday night to evaluate what caused the fire. The blaze may have been caused by a cigarette that was tossed out the window.
